attributes.description: The All Powerful Porsche Boxster S Is Absolute Fun To Drive. Enjoy The Great South African Weather In This Stunning Convertible. Our 2008 Model Is Beautifully Appointed In Yellow With A Navy Blue Suede/Leather Interior. Features Include BOSE Sound, Cruise Control, Original Porsche Radio And CD Player, Air Conditioner And 18 Inch Alloy Wheels. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

With such a variety, you are guaranteed to find a Warranty and Service Plan that will suit your individual needs as a motorist.
